name: 7thingsmedia Ltd
overview:
About Award-winning Performance Marketing Agency based in Farringdon, London & New York. Website: http://www.7thingsmedia.com/ Twitter: http://twitter.com/7thingsmedia

Mission To help advertisers and affiliates drive more revenue - whilst having a bit of fun along the way ;) Company Overview 7thingsmedia are a young, dynamic and entrepreneurial performance-based digital marketing agency with a proven track record of delivering hugely impressive returns for clients.

Description 7thingsmedia is an award-winning, young, dynamic, and entrepreneurial performance-based digital marketing agency with a proven track record of delivering hugely impressive returns for clients. With offices in both London and New York; 7thingsmedia’s services span the digital marketing mix including affiliate management, display advertising, lead generation, paid and natural search.

Client list includes: Agent Provocateur, Econsultancy, Gio Goi, John Hardy, Liberty, MARS, Secret Sales, Ted Baker, UNICEF, USC & MORE!
